meanings.definition: Surpassing all others in excellence, achievement, or quality.
meanings.sent1: The cake was the bests dessert at the party.
meanings.sent2: She always gives her bests effort in everything she does.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's bests attempt at climbing the tree was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His bests performance on stage left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The bests sunset I've ever seen painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The most excellent, effective, or desirable type or quality.
meanings.sent1: Quality is always the bests choice when it comes to clothing.
meanings.sent2: Her homemade cookies are the bests in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The bests of the bests in the art world gathered for the exhibition.
meanings.sent4: The bests of friends always support each other through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: The bests of the bests in the competition will receive a special prize.
